tour.title: The Mysterious East
tour.address: Jl. Kapten Harun Kabir, Cibeureum, Bogor Regency, West Java, Indonesia
tour.description: Bogor Safari Park is a children's tourist destination that is suitable for playing while learning. Here, you and your little ones will see amazing animals, such as orangutans or white tigers up close. No need to worry, your interactions with wild and rare animals at Safari Park are guaranteed to be safe!

about.title: About Bogor Indonesian Safari Park
about.ride_list: Safari Journey, Panda Palace, Night Safari, Safari Track & Outbound, Baby Zoo, Safari Waterpark, Komodo Dragon Island, Bird Dome, Animal Edutainment Show.

rules: It is prohibited to bring pets into the Bogor Safari Park area.
For foreigners, they are required to show an identity card in the form of a KITAS or domestic entry permit.
highlight_list: Take your car or take the Safari Park bus to see the animals roaming around in their natural habitat.
With a collection of more than 3,000 animals from 300 different species, check the package details, choose your tickets, and make your adventure here unforgettable!
Don't miss this rare opportunity to interact and feed them.
Suitable for: Fun Families and Fun Gangs.

location.title: Location
location.address: Jl. Kapten Harun Kabir, Cibeureum, Bogor Regency, West Java, Indonesia
